Metadata.title: Douglas Brum
Metadata.description: Hey, I'm Douglas Brum, a full-stack developer

About.title: About me
About.description: I'm a full-stack developer with experience in web and mobile development. Currently, I'm focused on web applications development with React and Node.js.

Stack.title: Tech Stack
Stack.description: I have experience with the following technologies:

storem.desc: Storem is a web application that allows users to manage and share files in the cloud.

open-vinyl-box.desc: Open Vinyl Box is an e-commerce focused on selling vinyl records and items related to the music world.

yabbl.desc: Yabbl is a web application that allows users to create and join real-time chat rooms.

ygibringer.desc: YgiBringer is a desktop application that connects to the browser to manage the state and facilitate the setup of Instagram accounts.

Contact.title: Contact
Contact.description: Whether you have a question or just want to say hello, I'll try my best to get back to you! Feel free to mail me any interesting topic
Contact.name: Name
Contact.success-message: Your message was sent successfully. I'll be in contact as soon as possible.
